bibl.title: Lexicon of the Greek and Roman Cities and Place Names in Antiquity. Ca 1500 B.C. - Ca. A.D. 500. Edited by K. BRANIGAN, N. DEMAND, F. FELTEN, A.M. HAKKERT, E. OLSHAUSEN, V. VELKOV, R.F. WILLETS, G. WIRTH, K.A. WORP. Fascicle 1. A[...]... - Ad Novas. 3.

bibl.seg: HAKKERT Adolf M. (General Editor), Lexicon of the Greek and Roman Cities and Place Names in Antiquity. Ca 1500 B.C. - Ca. A.D. 500. Edited by K. BRANIGAN, N. DEMAND, F. FELTEN, A.M. HAKKERT, E. OLSHAUSEN, V. VELKOV, R.F. WILLETS, G. WIRTH, K.A. WORP. Fascicle 1. A[...]... - Ad Novas. 3.
Amsterdam, A.M. Hakkert, 1992, 4°, coll. 1-160, nombr. cartes. ISBN 90-256-1036-6. 45 fr. s.
Les notices relatives aux toponymes égyptiens sont rédigées par K.A. WORP.
Hakkert Branigan Demand Felten Olshausen Velkov Willets Wirth Worp
